business_about: Burberry is a global fashion brand with a rich British heritage. Founded in 1856, the brand was established by Thomas Burberry who revolutionised rainwear with his invention of gabardine - a shower-resistant fabric that is used for Burberry's signature trench coat styles. Based in London under the creative expression of Daniel Lee, the brand epitomises modern British luxury in its design of womenswear, menswear, childrenswear, accessories and beauty.

business_about: At Ramco Cars, we understand that driving a supercar is a dream for many people. Our goal is to make that dream a reality by offering the ultimate supercar experience at Westfield London. And even if you can't get behind the wheel but still want to experience the thrill of sitting as a passenger, we have you covered! Our one hour supercar experience is for everyone to enjoy. So if you've always wanted to drive a Ferrari, Lamborghini, or Porsche, we have the perfect vehicle to satisfy your desires. Our fleet of prestigious supercars is designed to give you the opportunity to feel the raw power, stunning design, and exceptional performance of these iconic machines. Our team is dedicated to providing outstanding customer service, ensuring that your supercar experience is exceptional from start to finish. Whether you're celebrating a special occasion or simply treating yourself to an unforgettable adventure, we will go above and beyond to make your time with us truly unforgettable.

business_about: Our Pall Mall store provides for both fresh and saltwater game and lure fishing and for all UK field sports from stalking in the Highlands to traditional driven bird shooting. Additionally, via Farlows Travel, we are the ‘one-stop-shop’ for angling experiences of a lifetime, offering the finest destinations and hosted trips across the globe. Our travel destinations include the prestigious Atlantic Salmon Reserve on Russia’s Kola Peninsula, a classic location for salmon fishermen and the world’s first conservation area for Atlantic salmon and trout. When customers leave our store, they do, however, take away much more than the finest equipment and clothing, they also take with them some of our team’s knowledge, experience and wisdom.

Because real value lies not in the products we own, but in the experiences we share. Every month Flying Tiger Copenhagen launches 300 new products. Things you need. Things you dream of. Things you didn't know existed. Each one presents a possibility to make things you care about happen.

business_about: Kensington Mobile Repairs are the trusted tech repair specialists, offering express iPhone and Samsung screen repair services near you, alongside battery Replacement for iPhones and Samsung and several other Broken iPhone repair services. With the iPhone screen repair performed in as little as 30 minutes, feel free to wait with us in-store, or leave your iPhone and come back later to collect it. Our expert technicians can carry out your iPhone screen repair, whatever the issue. Whether your iPhone has a scratched or cracked screen and needs a screen or battery replacement, or if you are experiencing issues with your audio, buttons, camera, or charging port. l Our specialists are trained to diagnose and fix all of these issues while you wait

John Lewis is a chain of British department stores operating throughout the United Kingdom and with international delivery across 37 countries. John Lewis' flagship store spans six floors and has over 20 departments covering fashion, homewares, technology, beauty and much more. A range of services, experiences and facilities are also on offer at this branch from a demonstration kitchen and Waitrose Foodhall in the basement to a florist on the ground floor and Cafe Bar by Benugo on the first. There are four restaurants, a bureau de change, Kuoni Travel and more. Pop in and ask a Partner for the latest workshops, tasters and classes happening in store, or otherwise check the website and What's On page for local events near you.

business_about: Are you looking for a women's underwear and accessories store in London? Hurry over to the Intimissimi store in London, at 368/370 Oxford Street. You'll always find new, fashionable and sophisticated styles here and you'll be spoilt for choice. Collections of women's underwear, pyjamas, women's nightgowns and dressing gowns, sports and home wear, comfortable everyday outfits and sensual lingerie: a wide range of products awaits you. And that's not all: at Intimissimi we always guarantee the finest materials. What are you waiting for? Come and visit us in store!

business_about: We can't wait to welcome you to our new home of knockout vintage in the heart of Soho. Beyond Retro’s Soho store has become a staple as one of the best in Central London’s vintage clothing shopping scene, only moments away from the shopping meccas of Carnaby Street and Oxford Street. With thousands of handpicked vintage clothes and shoes that have been dressing the Soho set for over a decade. Hawaiian shirts, cocktail dresses, vintage band t shirts, jeans, sportswear, Soho has it all, complete with the best records playing on the fashion high street.

business_about: At Ramco Cars, we understand that driving a supercar is a dream for many people. Our goal is to make that dream a reality by offering the ultimate supercar experience at Westfield London. And even if you can't get behind the wheel but still want to experience the thrill of sitting as a passenger, we have you covered! Our one hour supercar experience is for everyone to enjoy. So if you've always wanted to drive a Ferrari, Lamborghini, or Porsche, we have the perfect vehicle to satisfy your desires. Our fleet of prestigious supercars is designed to give you the opportunity to feel the raw power, stunning design, and exceptional performance of these iconic machines. Our team is dedicated to providing outstanding customer service, ensuring that your supercar experience is exceptional from start to finish. Whether you're celebrating a special occasion or simply treating yourself to an unforgettable adventure, we will go above and beyond to make your time with us truly unforgettable.
